propDescriptions.componentsProps: The props used for each component slot.

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.

landscape.nodeName: the root element in landscape orientation

contentWrapper.nodeName: the contentWrapper element (which contains the tabs and the view itself)

slotDescriptions.Toolbar:
Custom component for the toolbar.
It is placed above the picker views.
slotDescriptions.ActionBar: Custom component for the action bar, it is placed bellow the picker views.
slotDescriptions.Layout:
Custom component for wrapping the layout.
It wraps the toolbar, views, and action bar.
